text: Praising Yahweh in the Temple at Night
A song of ascents.\f + \fr Ps 134 \ft The Hebrew Bible counts the superscription as the first verse of the psalm \f*
Look, bless Yahweh, all \add you\add* the servants of Yahweh,
who ⸤serve⸥\f + \fr 134:1 \ft Literally “stand” \f* in the house\f + \fr 134:1 \ft Or “temple” \f* of Yahweh by night.
Lift up your hands in \add the\add* sanctuary
May Yahweh bless you from Zion,
\add he who\add* made heaven and earth.
